snippet: Islamic State militants have severely damaged a major Roman monument in the ancient Syrian city of Palmyra, an antiquities official said after visiting the site on Saturday....

headline.main: Canada's Hydro One in Talks to Buy Toronto Hydro-Sources
headline.print_headline: Canada's Hydro One in Talks to Buy Toronto Hydro-Sources

lead_paragraph: Islamic State militants have severely damaged a major Roman monument in the ancient Syrian city of Palmyra, an antiquities official said after visiting the site on Saturday.
